attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe we can improve road safety by making all road users equally accountable. If I cause death by dangerous driving in a car how is this different to a bike rider doing the same? I suggest a nominal tax be it a pound for all vehicles on the road and a licence for all. If your son or daughter were killed by a cyclist would you like to see them brought to justice or given a fine?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
